creator: Pearler
descriptionHtml:
Build financial independence, no matter where you are on the investing journey. Pearler can help you get there – it’s investing made simple again.
Pearler is a share trading app designed to help you invest smart to build financial independence. We don’t have all the answers (nobody does), but we’re on a mission to help you find your own.
With the Pearler app, you can:
• Discover your investing style through shares trading, LICs and ETF investing
• Avoid hidden fees and simply pay low fees per trade
• Choose assets to invest in or use a template portfolio to get you started
• Build wealth while you sleep with a set-and-forget Autoinvest strategy
• Track your progress towards financial independence or any other financial goal
• Follow Finfluencers to learn and help you find your investing path
Get rich slow – that’s the Pearler mantra. Real investing should be about going the distance. Investing should be boring.

That’s why Pearler is built for long-term investors, not traders. No FOMO, no get-rich-quick stock tips, just insights from a community you can trust. With Pearler, you don’t do the journey alone. Plus, you can earn investment credits for referring your friends!

Ready to build your wealth? Download the Pearler app for free and start your journey today.
